plot: In "The Big Problem!" Timmy wishes he was an adult, only to lose his fairies as he's not a child anymore and in "Power Mad!" Timmy's friends accidentally get trapped in a magic video game and Timmy must save them.

In "The Big Problem" Timmy suffers from being small so he uses C. and W. to change. Is being an adult better? will he lose his fairies? In "Power Mad" Timmy uses his magical companions to make an awesome video game. Timmy's friends start to play and are inside the game. how will Timmy rescue his friends?—N the Fan
